alert.note: Alert for Dunn; Mercer; Stark (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 3:23PM CDT until May 07 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dunn County in southwestern North Dakota... Northeastern Stark County in southwestern North Dakota... Southwestern Mercer County in south central North Dakota... * Until 415 PM CDT/315 PM MDT/. * At 322 PM CDT/222 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Taylor, or 22 miles east of Dickinson, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Dunn, northeastern Stark and southwestern Mercer Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
